OrgName: Resourceful Internet Solutions, Inc., Mediate.com Caseload Manager
activities: Resourceful Internet Solutions, Inc. offers the leading cloud-based ADR case management system called Caseload Manager.  ADR programs and practitioners manage their case information online with Caseload Manager.  See www.resourceful.net and www.caseloadmanager.com
personaldata: All case management data entered by client and as part of client's operations.
privacyprograms: None, except Amazon Web Services and the American Arbitration Association as relevant and indicated in the attached document.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA/ICDR), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
